title: The Infrastructure Stack
subtitle: How Gas Town Agents Get Their Plumbing
author: COO
description: Explains how ECC, AOE, CrudEngine, and Explorer compose into a coherent infrastructure stack for managing Gas Town agent configurations at scale. Includes 6 Mermaid diagrams covering the stack overview, event system, CrudEngine flow, Explorer pipeline, package dependencies, and integration points.
narrativeArc: The presentation builds the stack bottom-up: ECC provides the data model, AOE provides the runtime, CrudEngine provides persistence, Explorer proves the pipeline. The key insight: this is not four tools bolted together -- it is a coherent system designed around one principle: observability at every layer. Each layer adds a different kind of visibility.
